property.name: language
property.label: Language Filter
property.description: Choose language menu to display. For unauthenticated / guest users if {!language} is chosen, the language is populated based on the language picker component. For authenticated users, the language is based on their language / locale selection in their user settings. If a hardcoded language is chosen from the picklist of values or {!language} is chosen and a url parameter called 'language' is passed, it takes precedence and overrides user settings. If translation is not needed, leave the default 'none' value.
